d1_flags: 1. goto C9D3A9 if POO_JOINS is set
d1_text:
Npc1104:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG POO_JOINS L_C9D3A9]
ï¿½Oh![PAUSE 15]  Prince [PRINT_STAT POO_NAME]![PAUSE 20]  I'm surprised you're not in training![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It seems like that's all you do these days.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Why don't you take some time to play with me?[PAUSE 30]  I'm so lonely without you...[HALT][END]
